# particleSizeVariation

**Instance Property**

The range of randomized particle sizes. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var particleSizeVariation: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting a nonzero value for this property randomizes the effect of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleSize] property. SceneKit randomly adjusts the size of each particle by up to half the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleSizeVariation] value. For example, if the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleSize] value is `1.0` and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleSizeVariation] value is `0.5`, newly spawned particles are randomly sized between `0.75` and `1.25` units wide and high.

The default value is `0.0`, specifying no randomization.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

## Specifying Particle Appearance

- **particleSize**: The rendered size, in units of the scene’s world coordinate space, of the particle image. Animatable.
- **particleColor**: The color of newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleColorVariation**: The ranges of randomized particle color components. Animatable.
- **particleImage**: The texture image SceneKit uses to render each particle.
- **fresnelExponent**: The reflectivity exponent SceneKit uses when rendering the particle’s image as a cube map. Animatable.
- **stretchFactor**: A multiplier for stretching particle images along their direction of motion. Animatable.
